metadata.title: CVE-2021-3155 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: snapd 2.54.2 and earlier created ~/snap directories in user homedirectories without specifying owner-only permissions. This could allow alocal attacker to read information that should have been private. Fixed insnapd versions 2.54.3+18.04, 2.54.3+20.04 and 2.54.3+21.10.1

criterions.comment: snapd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
